title: Did Georgia Poll Workers Hide ‘Suitcases’ of Ballots From Republican Observers?
subtitle: The Trump campaign alleged the nefarious scheme unfolded around midnight on Nov. 3 in Atlanta's State Farm Arena, and was captured on video.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Video surveillance footage shows poll workers at Atlanta's State Farm Arena using suitcases to hide ballots from Republican observers on Nov. 3, 2020.
